description: Public-safe service and pricing-positioning guidance extracted from the Sunny public pricing reference workbook.

services.public_pricing_positioning: Solar panel cleaning pricing varies across California based on system size, roof design, access, and environmental conditions. On the Central Coast, marine layer residue and agricultural dust require a higher standard of care. Residential service typically starts at $149, with pricing scaling based on system size and complexity. A single, all-inclusive system price is provided rather than per-panel pricing.
services.sunny_usage_notes: Never disclose per-panel rates or calculation logic. Emphasize performance restoration, system protection, and regional conditions.

services.public_pricing_positioning: Commercial and multi-property solar cleaning is priced per site or per contract. Pricing reflects access, panel layout, volume, travel, compliance requirements, and service frequency. Volume and recurring service discounts may apply.
services.sunny_usage_notes: Frame pricing as customized and proposal-based. Avoid internal estimating details.

services.public_pricing_positioning: Soft washing is priced based on roof size, pitch, material type, and organic growth level. This low-pressure method is preferred for most residential roofs and is positioned as preventative maintenance rather than cosmetic cleaning.
services.sunny_usage_notes: Emphasize roof safety and insurance-friendly practices.

services.public_pricing_positioning: Pressure washing is used selectively on durable roofing materials where appropriate. Pricing reflects roof size, access, pitch, and contamination severity.
services.sunny_usage_notes: Only recommend when suitable. Avoid implying pressure is standard.

services.public_pricing_positioning: Surface cleaning for concrete, pavers, sidewalks, drive-thrus, and commercial hardscapes. Pricing is based on square footage, access, and service frequency. Recurring commercial service may receive preferred rates.
services.sunny_usage_notes: Position as professional surface maintenance, not basic washing.

services.public_pricing_positioning: Low-pressure exterior cleaning for siding, stucco, fencing, and painted surfaces. Pricing scales with surface area, height, and access.
services.sunny_usage_notes: Often bundled with roof or solar services.

services.public_pricing_positioning: Gutter cleaning is priced based on linear footage, story height, and access. Service includes manual debris removal and controlled flushing to ensure proper drainage.
services.sunny_usage_notes: Avoid mechanical blowing language. Emphasize care.

services.public_pricing_positioning: Minor gutter leak repairs are priced per repair location following inspection. This service addresses seams, joints, and end caps.
services.sunny_usage_notes: Clarify this is not full gutter replacement.

services.public_pricing_positioning: Gutter guard installation is priced per linear foot plus materials. Final pricing is determined after inspection of existing gutter condition and roof compatibility.
services.sunny_usage_notes: Position as a long-term maintenance reduction solution.

services.public_pricing_positioning: Solar bird and rodent proofing is priced based on the linear perimeter of the solar array and system complexity. Installation prevents nesting and long-term damage beneath panels.
Eviction and cleanup services are priced based on contamination level and system access. This service is required prior to installing solar critter guards when nesting is present.
services.sunny_usage_notes: Frame as a necessary health and safety step.
